mapper.select: SELECT user_id,MIN(create_time) create_time from trans_convert where status = 8 and delete_flag = 0 group by user_id
SELECT FROM trans_convert t WHERE order_sn = #{orderSn}
SELECT FROM trans_convert t WHERE third_order_sn = #{thirdSn} and pay_type=#{payType}
SELECT FROM trans_convert t WHERE create_time >=#{date} and status = 1 AND channel_id = 100001
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(third_amount),0) FROM `trans_convert` WHERE STATUS=8 AND delete_flag=0 and user_id=#{userId}
SELECT max(third_amount) FROM trans_convert WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status=8 AND delete_flag=0
SELECT count(1) FROM trans_convert WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status=8 AND delete_flag=0
SELECT user_id,sum(third_amount) business_money FROM `trans_convert` WHERE `status`=8 AND delete_flag=0 AND create_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} and #{endDate} group by user_id

SELECT user_id userId, channel_id channelId, COUNT(1) rechargeCount, SUM(third_amount) thirdAmount, biz_type bizType, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,"%H") convertHour, DATE_FORMAT(update_time,"%Y-%m-%d") convertDate FROM `trans_convert` WHERE 1=1 AND update_time BETWEEN #{beginDate} and #{endDate} AND status=8 AND delete_flag=0 GROUP BY user_id, channel_id,biz_type,DATE_FORMAT(update_time,"%H"),DATE_FORMAT(update_time,"%Y-%m-%d")
